women.name: pilgrim blue dress
women.details: The vintage pilgrim dress gives this conservative look a reboot with a simpler design.
women.forward: Our super soft and elegant dress works well for formal ocassions
women.washer-details: Machine wash cold or dry clean. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Cool iron.

women.name: chun li tennis jacket
women.details: A timeless jacket featuring front button snap closure, dual side pockets and contrasting rib-trim at the collar, cuffs and bottom hem on our Heavy Terry, a heavier weight, loop back terry.
women.washer-details: Machine wash cold or dry clean. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Cool iron.

women.name: simple slip dress
women.details: Crossback Slip Dress featuring a lettuce edge in our Mix Modal, a sexy, silky, soft and luxurious fabric. Pairs great with the rest of our Mix Modal collection.
women.foward: Mix Modal combines ultra-soft, silky fiber with unique durability. Derived from beech trees, this anti-pilling fabric is shrink-resistant with a cotton-like feel. Modal’s luxe draping effect is ideal for intimates, loungewear, and day-to-night silhouettes.
women.washer-details: Machine wash cold or dry clean. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Cool iron.

men.name: detective trench jacket
men.details: The Detective Jacket is a versatile, single-breasted style rooted in our motoring heritage. Light and protective, it is made in England in our signature cotton gabardine and lined in our Vintage check – a print first used in the 1960s. The Pimlico fit is softly tailored with a straight cut that slips easily over other layers. The style is finished with set-in sleeves.
men.washer-details: Machine wash cold or dry clean. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Cool iron.

men.name: orane patchwork coat
men.details: This plaid work of art was made for the working man. Stitched to match the 70's vintage look.
